text: [crash]

[laughs] Oh, hello,
Perry the Platypus.

You're just in time to watch
me, Dr. Heinz Doofenshmirtz
do a theme song takeover!

So nice of you to stop
by for the big show.
[nefarious music playing]
[robotic sounds]
Captive audience.
I love it.

With more adventures
of "Phineas and Ferb"

on the way, I will no
longer be relegated
to the lesser b storylines.

It's time for Dr. D to be
front and center, baby.
Hit it!

(SINGING) There's hundreds of
more ways that I can be evil.
No super villain is greater.

Before I tell you the goals
that I plan to achieve,

I'll show you my
brand new inators.
Like this one!

This one will turn
you into a giant

and fill your pants
with macaroons.

If you argue with me, this
one will make you compliant.

This one turns your
fingers into spoons.

And this one guarantees that
you'll grow extra knees,

but keep the same number
of feet strangely.
And here's a big surprise.
This one makes apple pies.

But sadly, they're
full of raw meat.

I don't know why.
It's gross.

As you can see, I've
got a lot of inators,

but, you know, they say
the more the merrier.

And that's the reason in
this brand new season,

I'll take over the
Tri-State area!

And that's the reason in
this brand new season,

I'll take over the
Tri-State Area!
Hey!

Perry the Platypus,
you-- you escaped.
No!
Not my undoanator!
[zap]
Ah.
Oh, well.
Back to being the b story again.

You know, we may not be the
leads of "Phineas and Ferb,"
but we still have fun.
Don't we, Perry the Platypus?
[zap]
Wh-- what?

You turned my
fingers into spoons!
Curse you, Perry the Platypus!
[tinkling]
Oh, listen to this one.
I can get used to this.
